otherNames: Living for the Day After Tomorrow, A Direction of the Day After Tomorrow, Towards the Day After Tomorrow, あさっての方向。
synopsis: Karada is a young girl who hates being treated like a child and who wishes to be grown up. Shoko is an aloof, unhappy young woman who has just returned from overseas. When they meet by coincidence one night at a local shrine where they both like to make wishes and both exchanged ages.
